location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Musandim Island from the South' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:141 x 188 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘50’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of Musandim [Musandam, Oman] Island from the south, from on board ship. Various locations are marked via stippled lines and denoted above the image in ink.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Musandim promontory from the West.'Ink, above image, from left to right: ‘Mainland’; ‘Fak el Asad Strait’; ‘Musandim’Pencil, above image at right: ‘50’;’28’
